casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Harold COURTNEY, III 160PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 29, 2019 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Courtney, James Harold (III).

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Matthew G. Pruden, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Andrew B. Banzhoff, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of January 2019 by North Carolina Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of January 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
